div.p: In the event of a school closure due to inclement weather or an emergency, the information will be updated on the FlashAlert.net site . Washougal School District also uses an auto-notification system to let parents and staff know about school delays and closures. We will contact the phone number listed in the student information system for your family in the event of a weather incident. You can see what number we have on file for you by logging into WESPaC’s Family Access. The phone call will come from caller ID 360-954-3279.
The bus number will identify bus routes changed due to inclement weather, if on snow routes, 2 or 3 hour late start, or not operating.
Special services routes- students will be notified by driver if other than their regular stop location.
If a bus is on snow route or canceled for AM, it will be the same for the PM route unless the restriction is lifted.
If school closes early, there will be no PM Preschool, no PM SPACE, and afternoon/evening Community Education classes will be canceled. There will be no use of school facilities by outside entities.

ul.li: There is no Cascadia Technical Academy (Skills Center) bus
There is no preschool, SPACE, or Head Start program
There are no before or after school activities including athletics
There are no community education classes
SWCCC at Hathaway will generally not provide childcare. Please contact SWCCC at 954-3889 to check status.

h4.a: Additional Information if there is a 2 hour late start

ul.li: The school start time and your child’s bus pick-up time are adjusted forward exactly 2 hours
There is no early release on a Wednesday if we have a 2 hour late start
School for all grades K-12 will end at the non-Wednesday release time
Community education classes are held as normal, except those that meet immediately after school on an early release Wednesday, as the early release will not take place
There is no Cascadia Technical Academy (Skills Center) bus at WHS
WHS Zero Period classes are cancelled
The Washougal Adult Transition Program at WHS will start 2 hours late
There is no Head Start program at Hathaway
There is no AM Community Education Preschool or Special Education Preschool
PM Preschool is held as usually scheduled
The SWCCC program will be closed for the morning
The SPACE Program will start at 8:30 AM
All Special Education routes are also 2 hours late

li.span: All athletic practices or club activities BEFORE school are cancelled. The late start does not impact after school practice times or game schedules.

h4.a: Additional Information if there is a 3 hour late start

ul.li: The school start time and your child’s bus pick-up time are adjusted forward exactly 3 hours
There is no early release on a Wednesday if we have a 3 hour late start
School for all grades K-12 will end at the non-Wednesday release time
Community education classes are held as normal, except those that meet immediately after school on an early release Wednesday, as the early release will not take place
There is no Cascadia Technical Academy (Skills Center) bus at WHS
The Washougal Adult Transition Program at WHS will start 3 hours late
WHS Zero Period classes are cancelled
There is no Head Start program at Hathaway
There is no AM Community Education Preschool or Special Education Preschool
PM Preschool is held as usually scheduled
The SWCCC program will be closed for the morning
The SPACE Program will start at 9:30 AM
All Special Education routes are also 3 hours late

li.span: All athletic practices or club activities BEFORE school are cancelled. The late start does not impact after school practice times or game schedules.

ul.li: Visit the Washougal School District page on the Flash Alert website, which is used by local media organizations to discover changes to schedules and closures.
Follow us on Twitter @washougal_sd https://twitter.com/washougal_sd
Visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/WashougalSD/
Visit the local newspaper Columbian.com website
Listen to local radio stations
Watch local TV stations, or visit their websites
